entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
